name: Zapper: One Wicked Cricket
description: Zapper: One Wicked Cricket (also known as Zapper) is a platform game for the Xbox, Nintendo GameCube, PlayStation 2, Game Boy Advance and PC. The game was developed by Blitz Games and published by Infogrames. Zapper was released in North America in 2002 and 2003 in Europe. On November 17, 2008, Zapper became available on Xbox Live as part of the 'Xbox Originals' range.
